definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Effective measure solving the problem on decrease of rope is to use the steel wire rope with metal core.
sentences.chinese: 解决钢丝绳直径减小的有效措施是使用钢芯钢丝绳。

sentences.english: Effective measure solving the problem on decrease of rope is to use the steel wire rope with metal core.
sentences.chinese: 解决钢丝绳直径减小的有效措施是使用钢芯钢丝绳。

sentences.english: Chief officer, the wire rope loose.
What is the use of that wire which he has fastened there?
sentences.chinese: 他拴在那里的那根钢丝绳有什么用处了？

sentences.english: A wireline bailer that is used to remove sand and debris from the bottom of a well.
sentences.chinese: 从井底去除砂子和碎片所用的由钢丝绳起下的捞砂筒。

sentences.english: The polished rod is attached to the horsehead by the bridle.
sentences.chinese: 光杆用一段钢丝绳固定于驴头。

sentences.english: I should have let the wire do the work.
sentences.chinese: 我应该让钢丝绳完成这部份工作。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the principle of non-destructive ration examining device for TCK wire rope.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了TCK型钢丝绳无损定量检测装置的检测原理。

sentences.english: Protect wire slings from sharp corners or edges with padding.
sentences.chinese: 使用垫板保护锋利的拐角或边缘处的钢丝绳。

sentences.english: The research process and performance of high drop point fiber core grease were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了高滴点钢丝绳麻芯脂的研制过程及其性能。

sentences.english: Technical target of the product on zinc - plated wire rope grease is formulated.
sentences.chinese: 制定镀锌钢丝绳脂产品技术指标。

sentences.english: The steel wire establishment is much long, the hanging basket can climb high.
sentences.chinese: 钢丝绳设置多长，吊篮就能攀升多高。

sentences.english: A wireline device that uses knives to remove wax from tubing.
sentences.chinese: 利用刮蜡片从油管上刮蜡的由钢丝绳起下的装置。

sentences.english: It should use two steel lines and steel tube cover tope of frame to suspend if open box.
sentences.chinese: 开箱吊运时用二条钢丝绳和钢管套在底架顶环中起吊。

sentences.english: After the rope is tightened, the device shall be removed.
sentences.chinese: 钢丝绳被卡紧后将该装置撤掉。

sentences.english: The chemical propellant is packed inside the tool which is lowered on wireline.
sentences.chinese: 化学推进剂被装在工具内，工具用钢丝绳下入井内。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
